435240.name: Deathstate Soundtrack
435240.description:
This is the Deathstate Soundtrack. Now you can experience the game's haunting, mystic, music in your everyday life.

Composed by Pete Johnson, Mike Burns and Theo Swartz, all 16 tracks from Deathstate are available here in high-quality MP3 format.

Track List
  • 1. Main Title
  • 2. Cutscenes
  • 3. Somewhere Between
  • 4. The Fortress of Koth
  • 5. The Ossein Swamp
  • 6. The Maze of Ix
  • 7. The Vestibule of Carcassus
  • 8. The Temple of Qit
  • 9. The Lost Arcanium
  • 10. The Grave of Time
  • 11. Desecration
  • 12. Approaching Boss
  • 13. Boss
  • 14. The Seat of the Arcanist
  • 15. Credits
